Title: Romain Jerome SKYLAB 48 Red Limited RJ.M.AU.031.02
Description: Watches Jewelry Accessories About us Policies Romain Jerome SKYLAB 48 Red Limited RJ.M.AU.031.02 (Click to Enlarge) Romain Jerome SKYLAB 48 Red Limited RJ.M.AU.031.02 Condition: Unworn Brand: Romain Jerome Series: Special Creation Retail Price: $28,950.00 Reference: RJ.M.AU.031.02 Also Known As: RJMAU03102 Web ID: 159954Stock Number: 2188706-MCase Size: 47 mm Gender: Gents Movement: Manual Wind Caliber: RJ004-M Bezel: 18K Rose Gold Functions: Hours, Minutes, Seconds Strap: Alligator Clasp Type: Tang Signatures: Romain Jerome Included Items: Manufacturer's Box and Papers Power Reserve: 48 Hours Materials: Stainless Steel and PVD Case Back: Transparent (See-Through) Dial Color: Skeleton Romain Jerome present a mesmerizing timepiece that will always have some of the extraterrestrial within as the Skylab range each carry a piece of Apollo 11 inside. Displaying hours and minutes with red gold toned hands that are tipped with Super LumiNova, the time we count in our space on earth is measured out against the black skeleton of the watch mechanism, with seconds in a sub-dial to the 8 o'clock position. The manual wind-up movement with 21 jewels lays inside a stainless steel and PVD case. The see-through sapphire case-back provides a complete view on the inner workings. A protective 30m water resistance protects the mechanism while the 48mm case with red gold bezel is mounted onto a black horn back alligator and strap secured on the wrist with a deployment buckle.Please note that some watches are on memo from other dealers and do not carry a return policy, you will be notified before your purchase if the selected watch meets this criteria.
